articles.title: Tata Motors zooms to 52-week high on JLR outlook, IPO nod to Tata Tech - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Tata Motors has delivered returns of around 51 percent in the year so far on the back of an improving outlook for JLR, resilient demand and the upcoming IPO of Tata Technologies.
